name: CreateShortCode
description: Add a Short Code to the Proxy Number Pool for the Service.

ServiceSid.description: The SID of the parent [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/proxy/api/service) resource.

Sid.description: The SID of a Twilio [ShortCode](https://www.twilio.com/en-us/messaging/channels/sms/short-codes) resource that represents the short code you would like to assign to your Proxy Service.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the ShortCode resource.
**capabilities**: The capabilities of the short code.
**date_created**: The [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) date and time in GMT when the resource was created.
**date_updated**: The [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) date and time in GMT when the resource was last updated.

**is_reserved**: Whether the short code should be reserved and not be assigned to a participant using proxy pool logic. See [Reserved Phone Numbers](https://www.twilio.com/docs/proxy/reserved-phone-numbers) for more information.
**iso_country**: The ISO Country Code for the short code.
**service_sid**: The SID of the ShortCode resource's parent [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/proxy/api/service) resource.
**sid**: The unique string that we created to identify the ShortCode resource.
**url**: The absolute URL of the ShortCode resource.
